purpose: Enhance the functionality of Obsidian by providing AI-powered assistance for note-taking and information management
principle: Utilizes OpenAI's API to provide AI-driven suggestions and completions within the Obsidian environment
reusability: Available as a plugin for Obsidian, easily installable and configurable through the Obsidian plugin marketplace
limitations: Dependent on OpenAI API for AI features, which may incur costs; functionality limited to the capabilities of the OpenAI models used
name: obsidian-copilot
highlight: Integrates AI capabilities directly into Obsidian for enhanced note-taking and productivity
